Design and implement a high-end luxury flip flop brand with a focus on comfort, style and durability.
Create a flip flop with a built-in mini speaker, allowing users to listen to tunes while lounging by the pool.
Develop a smart flip flop with integrated sensors that provide real-time feedback on the wearer's balance and stability, helping to prevent falls and injuries.
Design a flip flop with a built-in power bank to help keep phones charged on-the-go.
Create a flip flop made from eco-friendly, biodegradable materials that can be composted at the end of their useful life.
